page.title: 19POPULAR PASTIMES
page.content: We did a survey of our class of our 11 year olds to find out our favourite things to do after school. Watching T.V. was the most popular, with Eastenders & 'Allo 'Allo being our favourite programmes. On average we watch T.V. for 3 hours a night on schooldays & 4\ hours at weekends or holidays. 40% of our class have a video. Our favourite films were the "Carry on"films & Superman. 36% have a computer; the Spectrum was the most common, followed by the Commodore 64. Card games were the most popular indoor games followed by Pac Man & Star Wars (arcade games).The most popular outdoor activity was sport (cricket, etc.) or riding our bikes.
